mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and use responsive design elements for better scaling on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider compressing images and minifying CSS/JS files to improve loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta tag descriptions and add more alt text for images to enhance visibility in search engines.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the navigation menu and reduce clutter on the homepage for a more streamlined user experience.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and adding progress indicators.
tips: Improve mobile optimization by making design elements more adaptive to various screen sizes.
